name: Sophia
comment: Star Wars Ep. VII: The Force Awakens is a thrilling return to the galaxy far, far away. The movie has great action, humor, and new characters that are easy to root for. A must-watch for any Star Wars fan.

name: Daniel
comment: Star Wars Ep. VII: The Force Awakens is a fun and entertaining movie that pays homage to the original trilogy. However, the plot feels a bit too familiar and some of the characters could have been developed more.
